column4: On menu System -> Main Menu, you can delete the unwanted entries.
it doesn't get deleted. i right clicked it and selected Delete but it still in the Main Menu
is there any xml or any text file which i can edit this?
Just try to run it as root
as root? how did you run it as root?
on terminal sudo (wait a moment... trying to remember...)

why is it that the entries when i'm using root is different when i run alacarte as a normal user? in a normal user... Other folder is showing MagicISO and Wine folder is there... while in root there is no MagicISO and the Wine folder isn't there.
As root you have complete control of all menu entries. Did that work for you?

yes it did... but when i checked the entries Wine folder isn't there and MagicISO is not in the Other anymore... but when i open alacarte using a normal user... wine-wine folder appears and MagicISO is in the Other folder
i just wanna know where i can find alacarte's entries
Ok. Trying to locate (think it is a xml one in /usr/somewhere...
